p: Kamchatka region has a significant amount of mineral deposits: gold, platinum, silver, nickel, cobalt, copper, mercury, sulfur, gas, oil, zeolite-containing tuffs, pumice perlites, geothermal resources. This is a non-inclusive list of prospective mineral resources which can be extracted in the region. Lately Kamchatka ore-mining industry has been taken a great interest. Such factors as economic efficiency and ecological safety of enterprise should be taken into account to develop ore-mining industry on the peninsula.
